General.Name: Guangzhou Friendship Group Co Ltd
General.Description: Guangzhou Yuexiu Capital Holdings Group Co., Ltd. engages in the finance and department store businesses in China. It provides investment banking services, including equity and debt financing, financial consulting, M&A financing, and innovation financing services; wealth management services comprising retail brokerage and wealth management, securities margin trading, buy-back based on pledge of stock right, agreed repurchase, quick loans, and futures brokerage services; trade and service for institutional clients comprising OTC market sales and trade, investment research, and broking; and investment management services, including fund management, and private equity and security investment. The company also offers sale-leaseback and direct financial leasing services; equity investment services for state-owned industrial development of Guangzhou; and PE/VC investment services. In addition, it provides industrial chain loans provided to enterprises or individuals; personal consumption credit loans; personal finance guarantee and enterprise financing guarantee services; and asset management services, as well as operates a department store in Guangdong. Further, the company engages in production and supply of electricity and heat; rental of photovoltaic power generation equipment; sale of general machinery and equipment; wholesale of daily-use utensils and daily groceries, and household appliances; operation of licensed medical devices; and real estate and venture capital businesses. Additionally, it provides securities brokerage; business; commodity futures brokerage; futures investment consulting; financial futures brokerage; investment management and consulting; corporate management; and financial consulting services. The company was formerly known as Guangzhou Yuexiu Financial Holdings Group Co., Ltd. Guangzhou Yuexiu Capital Holdings Group Co., Ltd. was founded in 1959 and is based in Guangzhou, China.
General.Address: Guangzhou International Financial Center, Guangzhou, China, 510623
